Domain development , DDD-CRS framework for node.js .
=======================================

Install 
======
		
		npm install crs

Example
======

		var crs = require("crs");
		var Domain = crs.Domain;
		var Builder = crs.Builder;
		
		var builder = new Builder();
		
		builder.bindService( ... )
				   .bindAggreType( ... )
				   .bindCommandHandle( ... )
				   .bindEventHandle( ... )
				   .bindEventHandle( ... ) 
				   .bindDB( ... )
		
		var domain = new Domain(builder);
		
		domain.on("event01",function(){ ... });
		domain.once("event02",function(){ ... });
		domain.exec(" command");
